p: EV71 nucleic acid was extracted from the clinical stool samples of suspected cases using a EV71 nucleic acid detection kit (Jiangsu Mole Bioscience Co., Ltd.) based on the centrifuge column method, according to the manufacturer's protocol. Fluorescence PCR was used to detect the EV71 pathogen using an ABI StepOne Plus system (Applied Biosystems; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.) and the parameters presented in Table I.
